duties_responsibilities.duty: Design, develop, document, test, and assist in implementation of secure medium to complex database solutions and ETL processes.
Work in both relational, non-relational and multi-dimensional environments.
Perform data development activities, research requests, resolve defects, mange time and planning of project activities for data management projects (new and existing).
Develop and test solutions including creating automated test scripts.
Collaborate with other IT colleagues and business users to define developmental requirements.
Elicit solid data element descriptions and definitions and with physical data modeling tools.
Efficiently work and produce results within the structure of project management methodologies (e.g., Agile, Scrum, Waterfall).
Demonstrate commitment to meeting organizational, department and team goals and objectives.
Familiar with the DevOps, data pipeline and sharing code repositories with tools such as GIT.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or related field (Master's preferred)
